mapper.select: SELECT * FROM training_checkins WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted = 0
SELECT * FROM training_checkins WHERE training_id = #{trainingId} AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY checkin_time DESC
SELECT * FROM training_checkins WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY checkin_time DESC
SELECT * FROM training_checkins WHERE training_id = #{trainingId} AND user_id = #{userId} AND deleted = 0 LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO training_checkins (training_id, user_id, checkin_time, checkout_time, is_late, is_early_leave, state, created_at, updated_at, deleted) VALUES (#{trainingId}, #{userId}, #{checkinTime}, #{checkoutTime}, #{isLate}, #{isEarlyLeave}, #{state}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, #{deleted})
mapper.update: UPDATE training_checkins SET checkin_time = #{checkinTime}, checkout_time = #{checkoutTime}, is_late = #{isLate}, is_early_leave = #{isEarlyLeave}, state = #{state}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE training_checkins SET deleted = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
